GameServer

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameServer.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Handles all important elements of an online game . Makes a new game and sends the updated one to clients playing it . Also handles the movements of all clients' tanks and saves it .
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String mode,
            java.lang.String endingMode,
            int minPlayers,
            int tankLive,
            int bulletPower,
            int brkWallsLives)
        Generates a new game with the given elements .
        Parameters:
        name - String , game's name
        mode - String , game's mode ( league or death match )
        endingMode - String , ending mode
        minPlayers - int , min numbers of players
        tankLive - int , tank lives
        bulletPower - int , power of bullets
        brkWallsLives - int , lives of breakable walls
